venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
WELCOME TO NEW MEMBERS 2010.... BRING A FRIEND!!!!

Enjoy cocktails and appetizers as we introduce our newest members to our group at Tavern In the Square (in Central Square). Be prepared to discuss your favorite cocktail meetups (with this group or any other group) from 2009 and which future meetups you would like to experience with "Fun With Alcohol" 2010. So many drinks yet to taste and places to try them!

At 7PM I would appreciate it if some of you could GET THERE EARLY to help me grab bar stools. Tables are only for those planning to eat dinner there. All Drinks and appetizers will be served at the bar. Standing room only for late arrivals.
EVERYONE MUST MAINTAIN THEIR OWN TAB!!!

For those who wish to STAY ....10PM There will be a DJ spinning 80s tunes


For those who wish to GO NEXT DOOR........9:00PM THE CANTAB, follow me downstairs to "Club Bohemia" to see WORLD FUSION "ESTHEMA" . There is an $8 cover charge after 9PM to see 4 bands...You DO NOT have to rsvp in advance for this event.


Take the T to the Central Square stop on the RED LINE Parking in Central Square is not an easy task so plan on getting there early.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Lauren. Look for "MEETUP" SIGN on the bar to your LEFT as you walk in. Grab a name tag. Standing room unless you get there early.
item.name: HAPPY HOUR @ TAVERN IN THE SQUARE (Central Square)
